Label: The Great Cataclysm
Summary: The hydrological cycle collapses. The sky falls on the ground. The world becomes a wet

Label: The First Kick
Summary: Big-Red (Kangaroo) finds a stone and thumps the ground

Label: The Filtration
Summary: Ripple (Platypus) unties the knot of chaos

Label: The Great Transmutation
Summary: Ash (Koala) inhales the toxic steam and exhales Menthol

Label: Planting of the Wattle
Summary: The Primes plant the single surviving seed. The Great Wattle grows and blooms.

Label: The First Song
Summary: The First Rosella sings the Spectrum Song
Participants: braiding the frequencies of the Primes. Arnamland wakes up.

Label: The Wombat Awakes
Summary: The First Wombat (Old Hunker) wakes up from the glare and starts digging tunnels.

Label: Loss of the Tail
Summary: Old Hunker trades his magnificent tail to the Black Dog of the Void to become the pillar of the world.

Label: The Grout-Baby Incident
Summary: Dust-Bearer Thump tricks Sovereign Vitabat I by sinking a perfect sphere trap into the deep substrate.

Label: The Jar of Silence
Summary: Uncle Hangbat accidentally spills the Jar of Silence in the deep tunnels

Label: The Theft of the Heat
Summary: Cold-Nose steals the Rot (compost) from the Tall-Ones to heat the Gray Grotto.

Label: The Root Thief
Summary: Kri-bat (The Blue Wombat) liberates roots from the High-Nose larders using rhythm.

Label: The One-Paw Pillar
Summary: Kri-bat holds up a collapsing roof with one claw
Participants: teaching the rock to hold itself.

Label: The Infinite Stomp
Summary: Kri-bat leads the mass dance on the Salt Pan
Participants: healing the cracks in the Glass for one night.

Label: The Crystalisation Begins
Summary: Human empathy fades. The Nico Star dims. The Arnam flow thins.

Label: Rise of the Static
Summary: Crystalline lattice begins to form in the deep substrate. Roots are severed.

Label: The Vanishing
Summary: The Platypus disappear because they cannot exist in a binary world. The Billabongs dry.

Label: The Drop Stops
Summary: Koalas stop performing the Drop and start selling Lyptus. The Quiet is commodified.

Label: The Circuits Break
Summary: Kangaroo mobs devolve into territorial gangs. The Friction Engine produces violence instead of stability.

Label: Rise of the Sovereigns
Summary: The Five-I's Council consolidates power in Melborow. Grout is poured.

Label: The Rosella Exodus
Summary: Rosellas are seduced by the Standing Wave and leave the Wattle to become crystal fragments.

Label: Fall of the Wattle
Summary: The Great Wattle on the Eastern Ridge shatters into glass. Cooroo loses his scream.

Label: The Jacaranda Prophecy
Summary: Cooroo hears the violet flower. Hoebat returns to Melborow. The final cycle begins.

Label: The Rain of Arnam
Summary: Potential future: The restoration of the flow through the Jacaranda's fractal antenna.
